title: Georgia Stories: Major Georgia Short Fiction of the Nineteenth and Twentieth Centuries
description: When Sunrise Elementary School advertised for a thick-skinned Librarian with a burning love of books, Miss Lotta Scales knew she was perfect for the job. Who could guard books better than a real dragon? Unfortunately, this means no one gets to get near the books, until nearsighted Molly stumbles in. Can an open book help the Library Dragon become a Library Goddess?
author: Ben Fornker
